intro: The Incredible Hulk was an American television series based on the Marvel comic book character of the same name. The pilot episodes were a pair of TV movies on the CBS network beginning on November 4, 1977; the series soon followed, airing from March 10, 1978[1] to June 2, 1982.[1] It starred Bill Bixby as Dr. David Banner and Lou Ferrigno as the Hulk. The concept was developed for television by Kenneth Johnson. The series still has a fanbase around the world, making it a cult classic.
card_subtitle: 1978 / 美国 / 动作 冒险 剧情 / Kenneth Johnson Alan J. Levi / Lou Ferrigno Bill Bixby
